test_case.title: Dropdown List Verification in Spotlight Search for 'k' Input
pre_condition: The user has any Mac device with macOS 11 (Big Sur), macOS 12 (Monterey), macOS 13 (Ventura), or macOS 14 (Sonoma) with an operational Spotlight Search.

steps.expected_result: Spotlight Search opens in the middle of the screen.

steps.action: Enter the letter 'k' in the search field.
steps.expected_result: The letter 'k' is inputted into the search field.

steps.action: Observe if a dropdown list opens automatically with additional search suggestions or results related to Keynote.
steps.expected_result: A dropdown list appears with search suggestions related to Keynote.

steps.action: Check that the following items are displayed in the dropdown list on the left side:
sub_steps: Keychain Access.app with its respective icon
After the "Keyboard" item, verify that a continuous string is displayed.
Icon of the Safari Browser with 'k' letter
After the "Safari Browser with the 'k' letter" item, verify that a continuous string is displayed.
The Icon of the System Settings for all:
Known networks with its respective icon
Keyboard shortcuts with its respective icon
Keyboard shortcut with its respective icon
After the "Keyboard shortcut" item, verify that a continuous string is displayed.
Check that "Photos From Apps" is shown on the left side and "Show More with >" on the right side.
Verify that some photos are displayed horizontally, with six of them visible.
Check that the dropdown list allows vertical scrolling.
Scroll down to confirm that more items are visible beyond the initial view.

expected_result: All specified items mentioned in the dropdown list are displayed on the left side
